School of machines, making & make–believe

Hello, World!

School of Machines, Making & Make-Believe is an organisation dedicated to the imaginative and non-sensical exploration of art and technology. We’re passionate about interactivity and storytelling. We enjoy learning and playing with tools that make our brains and our dreams come to life! Wanna join us?

We’re currently accepting applications for two, one-month, full-time experimental learning programs taking place this Summer in Berlin, Germany. We invite creative people of all kinds -- artists, technologists, writers, magicians, the curious, people passionate about learning and creativity, those who secretly desire to create something meaningful in their lifetime -- all are encouraged to apply! Each program will admit only 10-15 students.

Interested?
